The Heritrix warc file has 4 types of records, warcinfo, response, reques=
t and metadata.   The metadata record content appears to have the necessary=
 outlinks needed to create the webgraph. 

outlink: http://womenshealth.med=
.ucla.edu/menu.js E script/@src
outlink: http://womenshealth.med.ucla.edu/T=
HUimage/logo1.png E img/@src
outlink: http://womenshealth.med.ucla.edu/givi=
ng.htm L a/@href
outlink: http://www.clinicaltrials.ucla.edu/ L a/@href
out=
link: http://womenshealth.med.ucla.edu/favicon.ico I =3DINFERRED_MISC

I am=
 struggling to understand the meaning of all of the types of outlinks (embe=
d/@src, link/@href, =3DJS_MISC, =3DINFERRED_MISC, img/@src, etc) so that I =
can include only the desired outlinks.  For instance, I don't want to inclu=
de images, icons, css, java script in the webgraph.  From the above example=
 of the list of outlinks, it seems easy, just use the outlinks marked with =
"L".  But what about some of these other codes?

    E =3DEMBED_MISC  -- St=
and-in value for embeds without other context. (jpg, css, gif)
    X =3DJS_=
MISC          -- Stand-in value for JavaScript-discovered urls without othe=
r context.
    ?  =3DNAVLINK_MISC   -- Stand-in value for navlink urls with=
out other context.
    X =3DSPECULATIVE_MISC -- stand-in value for speculat=
ive/aggressively extracted urls without other context.
    I =3DINFERRED_MI=
SC    -- Stand-in value for inferred urls without  other context.
    ?  =
=3DPREREQ_MISC      -- Stand-in value for prerequisite urls without other c=
ontext.

    L a/@href
    L input/@value
    L param/@value
    L area/@hr=
ef
    E link/@href
    E script/@src
    E embed/@src
    E input/@src
   =
 E object
    E img/@src
    E img/@usemap

Any help would be appreciated. =


-David
